description: The Celestial Flowering Dogwood (Cornus 'Rutdan') is a beautiful flowering species of dogwood grown in the warm climates of the southern United States. It bears a magnificent flower, with delicate petals and a star-like center. Its glossy green foliage adds to this spectacular effect, making it an exquisite addition to any garden. This plant requires little maintenance, only requiring occasional trimming and pruning. It is also known for its low water needs and its excellent resistance to pests and diseases. This unique species of dogwood is sure to make any outdoor space stunning, with its stunning beauty, intense color and lush foliage.
